data.message: Mesh gradient implementation: 1) Layer multiple radial-gradient() with 'at X% Y%' positioning. 2) Each gradient fades to transparent at 50% for soft blending. 3) Animate with background-size: 1400% 1400% and background-position keyframes 0% 2% -> 100% 99% -> 0% 2%. 4) Use 30-45s duration for subtle, ambient movement. 5) For performance-critical apps, use WebGL (Stripe's approach) - only 10kb, GPU-rendered. CSS animations cause CPU/RAM strain on complex gradients.
